Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory346.jpg
Echo
Hff...
Echo breaths heavily beside you, struggling. Even with your help, the effects of the interferences on her M.I.N.D. are still going to take some time before they wear off.
Echo
Why... would that thing show up here...
Should we retreat to the conservation area?
Echo
I... can still fight.
Echo
With the ambush here, we now know that the destruction of Conservation Area 112 must be related to Utopia.
Echo
Stick to our route, and we should arrive in Conservation Area 112 tomorrow morning.
Echo
There's an abandoned outpost ahead of us. Let's rest there tonight...
As Echo explains her arrangements, your terminal suddenly rings.
You open the terminal to find new announcements from Babylonia, the first of which is...
Former Iris Warbler member Lena is suspected of defecting?
Under the announcement is a blurry photo in which a figure stands next to the armor holding Echo...
...Teasell?
Echo
Lena didn't defect or collude with any defector!
Echo frowns and interrupts you angrily.
Echo

That Construct... was indeed the one who took Cecily and me away from Constellia. He saved me because he believed I had the potential to become a Transcendant, but we parted way after I regained consciousness.
Why?
If Echo wanted to take revenge on Kurono while being hunted by both Babylonia and Utopia's Aurora Squadron, she could have easily chosen the defector's assistance.
Echo
...No particular reason. We just hold different principles toward things.
Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab
Teasell
...Tsk. Righteousness and justice?
Teasell
...Do you think they exist in this world?
Teasell
Were the things you experienced... not enough to open your eyes?
Teasell
Only power is eternal. You can only achieve the things you said if you have power.
Teasell
Ha... What a naive child. Go if you want. I won't stop you.
Teasell
You'll die in the righteousness and justice you so insist one day.
Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory346.jpg
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab
Echo
He and I are seeking different things.
You claimed you're not Lena...
...Yet all you've said just now is from Lena's perspective?
Echo
Echo never fails to look melancholic when she mentions Lena.
Echo
I met Lena back in Utopia... but she didn't defect, and I never used her identity to collaborate with any defectors, either.
Echo
She helped me tremendously and taught me a lot when I was in Utopia.
Echo
All I want to do is destroy Utopia and... find Lena.
Do you have information on Lena?
Echo
We got separated when we escaped, but I'm sure she didn't die. She told me she would escape...
Lena was a member of Caribou, which was a squad directly under Nikola's command. You have only heard that each member had different identities, but no one has ever known the truth.
Is Nikola aware of Lena's disappearance?
How did Echo replace Lena and enter Constellia? Why is she so desperate to find Lena now?
Echo
...I didn't clarify it in the beginning because I would sound guilty no matter how I described it.
Echo
But everything will be clear once we find Utopia.
This still sounds like an empty promise.
Echo
...I'm sorry I can't offer you more right now.
Echo
But I know that Babylonia probably wants to take advantage of my identity as a test subject.
Echo
Justice is bound to echo through the land. When Utopia is destroyed and the Aurora Squadron receives their deserving demise, I will go to Babylonia with you.
Echo
That is... if we uphold our current alliance.
Echo
I know Utopia has been researching the M.I.N.D., but I didn't know that he was capable of this already.
Recalling the weapon you encountered during the previous fight... you have indeed never heard of something that can directly interfere with a Construct's M.I.N.D.
Echo
I need you to connect to me to stabilize my M.I.N.D. so we can enter Utopia.
Echo
As for the questions you have on Lena, me, and Aurora Squadron... I'll slowly tell you everything, just like I promised.
Your terminal buzzes again—it's Lee's message. He has checked the surroundings and confirmed that Echo is not intentionally leading you to Kurono's trap.
Echo
I don't need you to trust me. We're just using each other to get what we need.
The purple-haired girl's eyes glisten with resolve.
Echo
You'll get the intel on Utopia and the Kurono test subject, and I... will find Lena and destroy Utopia.
...My stance hasn't changed.
...A pleasure working with you.
I reserve my right to contact Babylonia before this is over.
Echo
That's fine by me.
You interrupt Echo seemingly just before she is about to make a speech.
From the information you have gathered so far, there is an unquestionable connection between Echo, Aurora Squadron, and the flying fortress named Utopia.
Any new information you can get from her will certainly help Asimov's and your plan.
And how... will Project Winter and Aurora Squadron be linked?
When we stop to rest tonight...
Tell me your "story" then.
Echo
...That's... going to be a long one.
